## Bundle.IBundleCreateParams.normalize property

Whether to normalize the ResourceManagerBuilder before bundle creation. When true, the builder is reconstructed in canonical order to ensure order-independent checksums. Defaults to false for Phase 1 compatibility.

**Signature:**

```typescript
normalize?: boolean;
```
